en.module: Daily Assessments are not part of your Pivot Software Suite,
en.pitch: Looking for a formative assessment solution that allows teachers to create grade level or individual classroom assessments to assess learning of the exact content teachers are teaching? Looking to assess learning using technology enhanced questions in the same format as seen on high stakes tests? Pivot INSPECT is an item bank and suite of over 300 pre-built assessments that include a combination of rigor, innovation, integrity, and instructional guidance. Assessment reports are designed to provide specific feedback to quickly individualize instruction.
